messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: weed is now a legal and honest buisness

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: if botony doesn't start producing a shitton of weed soon we are going to name this a failed buisness venture and shut down the station

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: if we don't have 1k weed by  station time 20:00:00 we will nuke your station

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the broken clock timer we are extending it to 30:00:00 station time

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bar.
